subject: Your Flight Compensation Claim - Reference: FR12345
text:
Dear Passenger,

Thank you for your patience regarding your compensation claim FR12345.

We are pleased to inform you that your claim has been APPROVED.

Compensation Amount: €250

Reason: Your flight FR9876 from Warsaw to Dublin on 2025-10-01 was delayed by 4 hours, which qualifies for compensation under EU Regulation 261/2004.

Next Steps: The compensation will be transferred to your bank account within 7-10 business days. You will receive a separate confirmation email once the transfer is complete.

If you have any questions, please contact us at claims@ryanair.com.

Best regards,
Ryanair Claims Team
